comments.text:
The marketing campaign before the last two Avengers films had a drastically different vibe going into them than this go round. People were excited, people were ready for the conclusion and anticipating what was coming afterwards.

This time, the vibes are cautious, worrisome and hopeful that Marvel can complete a comeback and return to what made them THE franchise for a decade. If anything, I would understand if the studio changed their marketing strategy to build the anticipation each and every month beginning with the summer movie season.
comments.author: @chrisharvill1353
